rukus.text: femen azlemu mimmen kezebe `ale-llahi vekezzebe bissidki iz caeh. eleyse fi cehenneme mesvel lilkafirin
vellezi cae bissidki vesaddeka bihi ulaike humu-lmuttekun
lehum ma yesaune `inde rabbihim. zalike cezau-lmuhsinin
liyukeffira-llahu `anhum esvee-llezi `amilu veyecziyehum ecrahum biahseni-llezi kanu ya`melun
eleyse-llahu bikafin `abdeh. veyuhavvifuneke billezine min dunih. vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu min had
vemey yehdi-llahu fema lehu mim mudill. eleyse-llahu bi`azizin zi-ntikam

velein seeltehum men haleka-ssemavati vel'arda leyekulunne-llah. kul eferaeytum ma ted`une min duni-llahi in eradeniye-llahu bidurrin hel hunne kasifatu durrihi ev eradeni birahmetin hel hunne mumsikatu rahmetih. kul hasbiye-llah. `aleyhi yetevekkelu-lmutevekkilun
kul ya kavmi-`melu `ala mekanetikum inni `amil. fesevfe ta`lemun
inna enzelna `aleyke-lkitabe linnasi bilhakk. femeni-hteda felinefsih. vemen dalle feinnema yedillu `aleyha. vema ente `aleyhim bivekil
